Biography
Before starting at UW I was a master's student in the computer science department at ETH Zürich until September 2014. I was being mentored by Timothy Roscoe. The research I was involved in was being done in the context of the Barrelfish research OS together with other members of the ETH Systems Group.
I completed my bachelors degree in computer science at ETH Zürich in 2012 after three years. For more details see my CV.
Personal
My wife teaches English as a second language. We have two cats: Scotch & Whisky.
